name: todo-backend
description: Todo app backend with Express, TypeScript, and Mongoose

scripts.start: echo 'Starting from:' && pwd && echo 'Looking for:' && ls -la dist/ && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run debug:before && npm run compile && npm run copy:swagger && npm run debug:after
scripts.copy:swagger: mkdir -p dist/swagger && cp -r src/swagger/* dist/swagger/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No swagger to copy'
scripts.debug:after: echo 'ğŸ” After build:' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'ğŸ“ Full structure:' && find dist -type f
